title: CookBook
description: CookBook is a recipe web application, featuring a responsive layout. It's built with Next.js, TypeScript, Sanity CMS, and custom React + Tailwind CSS components.

title: MyShop
description:
Responsive Shopify store with custom Liquid, CSS, and JavaScript, inspired by 'Pangaia' online shop. Browse collections and products, select variants and manage cart. 

Demo password: 'demo'.

title: CityWeather
description: Simple weather app built with Next.js and TypeScript. Check current weather and local time for any city using OpenWeatherMap and WorldTimeAPI.

title: Portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website showcasing professional experience, projects, and skills. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS.
